hero.subtitle: A platform where owners of rats and other rodents receive help with veterinary costs. You request support, the Foundation helps raise the funds.

story.title: It all started with Elepepe
story.text: The Foundation was born from the love for one rat â€“ Elepepe. He taught his guardian that rodents are not just 'little animals in cages', but sentient beings capable of love and changing a human's life.
story.mission: Elepepe's Sanctuary is a one-person non-profit organisation. Its mission is to help owners of rats and other rodents cover veterinary expenses when they cannot afford them and the animal's health is at stake.

step1.title: Request Support
step1.desc: Fill out the form, describe the medical history, and attach the necessary documents.

step2.title: Verification
step2.desc: The Foundation verifies the request. If it aligns with our mission, we launch a fundraiser.

step3.title: Fundraising & Payout
step3.desc: Donors contribute to the specific cause, and the foundation transfers the funds to you.
